body_html:
I followed the instructions "install from source", but it didn't work. So I turn to install with git, as described above. The errors when installed from source are as follows:

[xxx pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297]$ python setup.py install
fatal: Not a git repository
running install
running build_deps
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "setup.py", line 494, in
install_requires=['pyyaml', 'numpy'],
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/core.py", line 151, in setup
dist.run_commands()
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 953, in run_commands
self.run_command(cmd)
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 972, in run_command
cmd_obj.run()
File "setup.py", line 203, in run
self.run_command('build_deps')
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/cmd.py", line 326, in run_command
self.distribution.run_command(command)
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 972, in run_command
cmd_obj.run()
File "setup.py", line 91, in run
from tools.nnwrap import generate_wrappers as generate_nn_wrappers
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/nnwrap/init.py", line 1, in
from .generate_wrappers import generate_wrappers, wrap_function,
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/nnwrap/generate_wrappers.py", line 4, in
from ..cwrap import cwrap
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/cwrap/init.py", line 1, in
from .cwrap import cwrap
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/cwrap/cwrap.py", line 5, in
from .plugins import ArgcountChecker, OptionalArguments, ArgumentReferences,
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/cwrap/plugins/init.py", line 425, in
from .OptionalArguments import OptionalArguments
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/cwrap/plugins/OptionalArguments.py", line 5, in
from ...shared import cwrap_common
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/shared/init.py", line 2, in
from .cwrap_common import set_declaration_defaults,
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/shared/cwrap_common.py", line 1
../../torch/lib/ATen/common_with_cwrap.py
^
SyntaxError: invalid syntax

I also follow http://pytorch.org/ to install from binaries via Conda or pip wheels and all fail. Can you give me some advice? Thank you very much.
body_text:
I followed the instructions "install from source", but it didn't work. So I turn to install with git, as described above. The errors when installed from source are as follows:
[xxx pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297]$ python setup.py install
fatal: Not a git repository
running install
running build_deps
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "setup.py", line 494, in
install_requires=['pyyaml', 'numpy'],
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/core.py", line 151, in setup
dist.run_commands()
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 953, in run_commands
self.run_command(cmd)
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 972, in run_command
cmd_obj.run()
File "setup.py", line 203, in run
self.run_command('build_deps')
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/cmd.py", line 326, in run_command
self.distribution.run_command(command)
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 972, in run_command
cmd_obj.run()
File "setup.py", line 91, in run
from tools.nnwrap import generate_wrappers as generate_nn_wrappers
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/nnwrap/init.py", line 1, in
from .generate_wrappers import generate_wrappers, wrap_function,
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/nnwrap/generate_wrappers.py", line 4, in
from ..cwrap import cwrap
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/cwrap/init.py", line 1, in
from .cwrap import cwrap
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/cwrap/cwrap.py", line 5, in
from .plugins import ArgcountChecker, OptionalArguments, ArgumentReferences,
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/cwrap/plugins/init.py", line 425, in
from .OptionalArguments import OptionalArguments
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/cwrap/plugins/OptionalArguments.py", line 5, in
from ...shared import cwrap_common
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/shared/init.py", line 2, in
from .cwrap_common import set_declaration_defaults,
File "/home/xxx/python_libpack/pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297/tools/shared/cwrap_common.py", line 1
../../torch/lib/ATen/common_with_cwrap.py
^
SyntaxError: invalid syntax
I also follow http://pytorch.org/ to install from binaries via Conda or pip wheels and all fail. Can you give me some advice? Thank you very much.
body:
I followed the instructions "install from source", but it didn't work. So I turn to install with git, as described above. The errors when installed from source are as follows:

[xxx pytorch-1199e3d4964ca5b167517c127094d66d5b1b4297]$ python setup.py install
fatal: Not a git repository
running install
running build_deps
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "setup.py", line 494, in 
install_requires=['pyyaml', 'numpy'],
File "/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/distutils/core.py", line 151, in setup
dist.run_commands()

self.run_command(cmd)

from tools.nnwrap import generate_wrappers as generate_nn_wrappers

I also follow http://pytorch.org/ to install from binaries via Conda or pip wheels and all fail. Can you give me some advice? Thank you very much.
